CustomSerializer.summary: The CustomSerializer class presents the serializer for the classes that implement ISerialize interface. Contains methods for serializing and deserializing objects.
CustomSerializer.typeparam: The type of instance to be serialized or deserialized.

BinSerialize.param: The file to which the object to be serialized.

BinDeserializeObject.param: The file from which object is to be deserialized.

JsonSerialize.param: The file to which the object to be serialized.

JsonDeserializeObject.summary: Deserializes object from the specified JSON file.
JsonDeserializeObject.param: The file from which object is to be deserialized.

XmlSerialize.param: The file to which the object to be serialized.

XmlDeserializeObject.summary: Deserializes object from the specified XML file.
XmlDeserializeObject.param: The file from which object is to be deserialized.

BinSerializeCollection.summary: Serializes collection of objects in binary format.
BinSerializeCollection.param: The file to which the specified collection is to be serialized.

BinDeserializeCollection.summary: Deserializes collection of objects from binary file.
BinDeserializeCollection.param: The file from which colection of objects is to be deserialized.

JsonSerializeCollection.summary: Serializes collection of objects in JSON format.
JsonSerializeCollection.param: The collection of objects to serialize.
The file to which the specified collection is to be serialized.

JsonDeserializeCollection.summary: Deserializes collection of objects from JSON file.
JsonDeserializeCollection.param: The file from which collection of objects is to be deserialized.

XmlSerializeCollection.summary: Serializes collection of objects in XML format.
XmlSerializeCollection.param: The collection of objects to serialize.
The file to which the specified collection is to be serialized.

XmlDeserializeCollection.summary: Deserializes collection of objects from XML file.
XmlDeserializeCollection.param: The file from which collection of objects is to be deserialized.

ISerialize.summary: The interface-marker to indicate that a class can be serialized by the CustomSerializer.

PersonConverter.summary: The PersonConverter class is the custom converter for JSON serialization and deserialization.

ReadJson.exception: Thrown when a property is not found in the deserializing file.

CanConvert.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified object type. Not implemented.
